name: Untombed
description:
Dive into an epic adventure with Matt and Sam as they look for an ancient cure in the lost ruins of Oaos'Atak! Run, jump and climb your way through this cinematic experience and find the cure!

This is a student project developed over the span of 8 weeks using Unreal Engine 5. We had no budget and a team of 9 people.

We hope you enjoy the game!

Keyboard and mouse as well as (XBOX) controllers are supported.
